name: Necrofancy
description:
Controls:
Witch: WASD-keys
Ghost: Arrow keys

Goal:
Hit your highlighted key. The witch wins by successfully summon the ghost up from its grave. The ghost wins by successfully go back to its eternal sleep.

A game by:
Anna Rüth
Anna Rosenkrans Birkedal
Emil Holmen
Ida Rosenkrans Birkedal
Laura Blicher
Linnea Ronneberg
